feed.title: CHIEN LAB
feed.subtitle: Our group's research focuses on integrated circuits and their convergence with bio- and quantum technologies. We are dedicated to creating sensors and devices for point-of-care diagnostics and emphasizing continuous monitoring through wearables, implantable devices, injectables, and swallowables. Additionally, we explore millimeter-wave ICs for communication, sensing, and interfaces for qubits. Please come talk to us if you’re interested in!

entry.title: CLEO paper acceptance!
entry.content:
Congrats to the NSF-Fuse team with two paper acceptance to CELO! Information below:

  1. High-Efficiency mmWave-to-Optical Converter with >30dB Sideband SNR on a Monolithic Integration Platform Xinchang Zhang; Manuj Singh; Hyeong Seok Oh; Awani Khodkumbhe; Ruocheng Wang; Ruifu Li; Deniz Onural; Vladimir Stojanovic; Danijela Cabric; Ali Niknejad; Jun-Chau Chien; Miloš A. Popović
  2. Efficient wideband mmWave-to-optical signal transduction by a monolithic CMOS LNA and photonic molecule modulator Xinchang Zhang; Hyeong Seok Oh; Manuj Singh; Ruocheng Wang; Awani Khodkumbhe; Ruifu Li; Vladimir Stojanovic; Danijela Cabric; Ali M. Niknejad; Jun-Chau Chien; Miloš A. Popović

author.name: Hyeong Seok Oh and Jun-Chau Chien

entry.summary: Congrats to the NSF-Fuse team with two paper acceptance to CELO! Information below: High-Efficiency mmWave-to-Optical Converter with >30dB Sideband SNR on a Monolithic Integration Platform Xinchang Zhang; Manuj Singh; Hyeong Seok Oh; Awani Khodkumbhe; Ruocheng Wang; Ruifu Li; Deniz Onural; Vladimir Stojanovic; Danijela Cabric; Ali Niknejad; Jun-Chau Chien; Miloš A. entry.title: IEEE MWTL paper acceptance!
entry.content: Congrats to the team on paper acceptance to IEEE MWTL 2025! Paper title: “Experimental Studies of Millimeter-Wave CMOS LO Circuits for High-temperature Qubits Operations.”

author.name: Yi-Ting Chen, Guan-Yu Haung, Prof. Jiun-Yun Li (NTU), and Ming-Jui Lin (NTU)

entry.summary: Congrats to the team on paper acceptance to IEEE MWTL 2025! Paper title: “Experimental Studies of Millimeter-Wave CMOS LO Circuits for High-temperature Qubits Operations.”

entry.title: EECS Department Arthur M. Hopkin Award

link.title: EECS Department Arthur M. Hopkin Award

entry.content: Alex received the Berkeley EECS Department Arthur M. Hopkin Award for oustanding undergraduate researchers! Congratulations!
entry.summary: Alex received the Berkeley EECS Department Arthur M. Hopkin Award for oustanding undergraduate researchers! Congratulations!

entry.title: RFIC25 Student Paper Finalist
entry.content: Ying-Han’s RFIC’25 paper on clock distribution has been selected for student paper finalist! Good job and best of luck!
entry.summary: Ying-Han’s RFIC’25 paper on clock distribution has been selected for student paper finalist! Good job and best of luck!

entry.title: Berkeley Fellowship
entry.content: Congratulations our incoming PhD student Alex on receiving the Berkeley Fellowship!
entry.summary: Congratulations our incoming PhD student Alex on receiving the Berkeley Fellowship!

entry.title: Oustanding GSI Award
entry.content: Big congrats to Averal and Rahul of receiving the campus Oustanding GSI Award from TAing for my EE240B in Spring 2024! Great job and congratulation!
entry.summary: Big congrats to Averal and Rahul of receiving the campus Oustanding GSI Award from TAing for my EE240B in Spring 2024! Great job and congratulation!

entry.title: Apple Fellowship!
entry.content: Big congrats to Sarika on receiving the Apple Fellowship! Keep up the exciting work!
entry.summary: Big congrats to Sarika on receiving the Apple Fellowship! Keep up the exciting work!

entry.title: RFIC paper acceptance!
entry.content: Congrats to the team on paper acceptance to RFIC 2025! This paper discusses 60-GHz coupled standing-wave oscillator arrays for LO distribution in future 240-GHz 2D phased array TRx. Paper title: “A 60-GHz Area-efficient Coupled Standing-Wave-Oscillators LO Distribution Network for a 240-GHz 2-D Phased-Array”.

author.name: Ying-Han You, Pin-Yu Lin, Sih-Ying Chen, Wei-Yu Lin, Jun-Chau Chien

entry.summary: Congrats to the team on paper acceptance to RFIC 2025! This paper discusses 60-GHz coupled standing-wave oscillator arrays for LO distribution in future 240-GHz 2D phased array TRx. Paper title: “A 60-GHz Area-efficient Coupled Standing-Wave-Oscillators LO Distribution Network for a 240-GHz 2-D Phased-Array”.

entry.title: CICC paper acceptance!
entry.content: Congrats to the team on paper acceptance to CICC 2025! The paper demonstrates the first biologic monitoring using electrochemical-sensing aptamers to address the needs for in-line monitoring in bioreactors. Congrats to the team! Paper title: A 0.7pArms Electrochemical Readout IC for Continuous Monitoring of Antibody Biologics in Upstream Biomanufacturing.

author.name: Hung-Yu Hou, Justine Tsai, Wei Foo, Yan-Ting Hsiao, and Jun-Chau Chien

entry.summary: Congrats to the team on paper acceptance to CICC 2025! The paper demonstrates the first biologic monitoring using electrochemical-sensing aptamers to address the needs for in-line monitoring in bioreactors. Congrats to the team! Paper title: A 0.7pArms Electrochemical Readout IC for Continuous Monitoring of Antibody Biologics in Upstream Biomanufacturing.
